sourceId.name: Fusion reactor MkI
sourceId.description: Enables a version of an old design from Earth.  Will require superconductors to build.

sourceId.name: Superconductor Factory
sourceId.description: Enables the fabrication of superconductors locally.

sourceId.name: Android Manufacturing
sourceId.description: Enables the manufacturing of androids, which can be both workers and colony helpers.  Androids require their own housing.  They may also be purchased using cargo rockets.

sourceId.name: Terraforming measurements
sourceId.description: Unlocks the terraforming tab, which allows monitoring of terraforming parameters.

sourceId.description: Allows the designing and production of specially engineered biomass.

sourceId.name: Greenhouse Gas Factories
sourceId.description: Allows the construction of greenhouse gas factories to produce SF6 which is stable, non-toxic and 23500 times more potent than CO2.

sourceId.name: Terraforming measurements
sourceId.description: Unlocks the terraforming tab, which allows monitoring of terraforming parameters.

sourceId.name: Black Dust production
sourceId.description: Unlocks a blueprint for black dust production, which can over a very long time significantly reduce the albedo of the ground to 0.05.

sourceId.name: Shipbuilding
sourceId.description: Enables the construction of spaceships.  Also unlock a special project for asteroid mining and resource disposal.

sourceId.name: Ship trading
sourceId.description: Allows the export of metal via a new special project and purchase of ships via the cargo rocket special project.  Also significantly reduces the duration of cargo rockets.

oreMine.description: Extracts minerals from the ground to produce metal, requires energy and minerals to operate. Requires a free ore deposit.

sourceId.description: Deepens all ore mines to improve production, adding one layer. Each completion improves metal production by an additive 100%. Most of the cost scales with ore mines built while a small portion also scales with their average depth.

sourceId.name: Deep ore mines
sourceId.description: Unlock a repeatable special project to increase ore output from mining.

sourceId.name: Android-assisted deeper mining
sourceId.description: Allows assigning androids to the Deeper mining project for massive speed boosts.

sourceId.name: deeperMining

sourceId.description: Deepens all ore mines to improve production, adding one layer. Each completion improves metal production by an additive 100%. Most of the cost scales with ore mines built while a small portion also scales with their average depth.

sourceId.description: Allows assigning androids to the Deeper mining project for massive speed boosts.

Efficient Ore Processing
sourceId.description: Doubles ore output from mines.

sourceId.name: Advanced Alloys
sourceId.description: Doubles metal output.

oreMine.name: oreMine

sandQuarry.description: Digs through regolith to extract silicon.
sandQuarry.name: sandQuarry

iceHarvester.description: Drones that roam the surface looking for ice. Self sufficient, but require heavy maintenance and only work during the day.

sourceId.name: Infrared Vision
sourceId.description: Equips ice harvesters with infrared sensors to operate around the clock.

iceHarvester.name: iceHarvester

waterPump.description: A pump for liquid water.  Requires liquid water to actually exist.
waterPump.name: waterPump

atmosphericWaterCollector.description: Condenses atmospheric moisture when little surface water remains.
atmosphericWaterCollector.name: atmosphericWaterCollector

recyclingFacility.description: Melts scrap metal back into metal.
recyclingFacility.name: recyclingFacility

glassSmelter.description: Uses high heat to turn silicon into glass.
glassSmelter.name: glassSmelter

hydroponicFarm.description: Botanists work hard to grow potatoes using local soil.  Water is provided by colonies, and recovered when the food is consumed.

sourceId.name: Farming robotics assistance
sourceId.description: Integrates robots within hydroponics farm to reduce worker requirements by 20%.

sourceId.name: Hydroponic Farm
sourceId.description: Produces food to feed colonists.

sourceId.name: Adapted crops
sourceId.description: Doubles the performance of our hydroponics farm using genetically modified potatoes.

hydroponicFarm.name: hydroponicFarm

componentFactory.description: Turns metals into valuable machine components. Requires human workers.

sourceId.name: Components factories
sourceId.description: Allows production of components using human workers.

sourceId.name: Assembly Lines
sourceId.description: Integrates robots within components and electronics factory to reduce worker requirements by 20%.

sourceId.name: Direct AI integration.
sourceId.description: Integrates yourself within all factories to reduce all factory worker requirements by 25%.

componentFactory.name: componentFactory

electronicsFactory.description: Turns metals and silicon into electronics.  Requires human workers.

sourceId.name: Electronics factories
sourceId.description: Allows production of electronics using human workers.

sourceId.name: Assembly Lines
sourceId.description: Integrates robots within components and electronics factory to reduce worker requirements by 20%.

sourceId.name: Direct AI integration.
sourceId.description: Integrates yourself within all factories to reduce all factory worker requirements by 25%.

electronicsFactory.name: electronicsFactory

superconductorFactory.description: Produces superconductors from metal.  Requires human workers.

sourceId.name: Superconductor Factory
sourceId.description: Enables the fabrication of superconductors locally.

sourceId.name: Precision Assembly Lines
sourceId.description: Integrates robots within superconductor and android factories to reduce worker requirements by 20%.

sourceId.name: Direct AI integration.
sourceId.description: Integrates yourself within all factories to reduce all factory worker requirements by 25%.

superconductorFactory.name: superconductorFactory

superalloyFoundry.description: Uses extreme energy and metal to forge advanced superalloys.
superalloyFoundry.name: superalloyFoundry

androidFactory.description: Produces androids.  Difficult and takes a lot of manufacturing operations, but can act as a worker and requires little consumer goods.

sourceId.name: Android Manufacturing
sourceId.description: Enables the manufacturing of androids, which can be both workers and colony helpers.  Androids require their own housing.  They may also be purchased using cargo rockets.

sourceId.name: Precision Assembly Lines
sourceId.description: Integrates robots within superconductor and android factories to reduce worker requirements by 20%.

sourceId.name: Direct AI integration.
sourceId.description: Integrates yourself within all factories to reduce all factory worker requirements by 25%.

androidFactory.name: androidFactory

shipyard.description: Produces spaceships that can be used for various space missions.

sourceId.name: Shipbuilding
sourceId.description: Enables the construction of spaceships.  Also unlock a special project for asteroid mining and resource disposal.

sourceId.name: Efficient Shipyards
sourceId.description: Doubles shipyard production and consumption.

sourceId.name: Efficient Shipyards
sourceId.description: Doubles shipyard production and consumption.

shipyard.name: shipyard

cloningFacility.description: Consumes energy to grow and educate new colonists.
cloningFacility.name: cloningFacility

solarPanel.description: Generates energy during the day using sunlight, but is inactive during nighttime.

sourceId.name: Improved Solar Efficiency
sourceId.description: Increases the efficiency of solar panels by 25%.

solarPanel.name: solarPanel

windTurbine.description: Produces energy consistently, unaffected by the day or night cycle, harnessing wind power.
windTurbine.name: windTurbine

geothermalGenerator.description: Generates consistent energy by harnessing heat from geothermal vents. Requires a free geothermal vent deposit to build. Requires water to function and minimal maintenance.

sourceId.name: Geothermal Power Generation
sourceId.description: Unlocks geothermal generators, which require reduced maintenance, and a project to scan for suitable vents.

geothermalGenerator.name: geothermalGenerator

hydrocarbonGenerator.description: Burns atmospheric methane and oxygen to generate energy, releasing water vapour and carbon dioxide.
hydrocarbonGenerator.name: hydrocarbonGenerator

nuclearPowerPlant.description: Harnesses the power of the atom to generate energy.  Consumes water.

sourceId.name: Nuclear Power Plant
sourceId.description: Unlocks nuclear power plants, which produce vast amount of energy at great upfront cost.

sourceId.name: Closed loop water cycle
sourceId.description: Reduces the water consumption of nuclear reactors by 80%.

sourceId.name: Closed loop water cycle
sourceId.description: Reduces the water consumption of nuclear reactors by 80%.

sourceId.name: Adapted fission power
sourceId.description: Doubles the production of nuclear reactors.

sourceId.name: Adapted fission power
sourceId.description: Doubles the production of nuclear reactors.

sourceId.name: Modular Nuclear Reactor
sourceId.description: Miniaturizes fission reactors and automatically completes their research.

sourceId.name: Modular Nuclear Reactor
sourceId.description: Miniaturizes fission reactors and automatically completes their research.

sourceId.name: Modular Nuclear Reactor
sourceId.description: Miniaturizes fission reactors and automatically completes their research.

sourceId.name: Fusion reactor MkI
sourceId.description: Enables a version of an old design from Earth.  Will require superconductors to build.

sourceId.name: Improved fusion reactor
sourceId.description: Doubles the production of fusion reactors.

sourceId.name: State of the art fusion reactor
sourceId.description: The best design that can be made.  Provides another 2x multiplier.

superalloyFusionReactor.description: Enormous fusion plant using superalloys for containment.

sourceId.name: State of the art fusion reactor
sourceId.description: The best design that can be made.  Provides another 2x multiplier.

superalloyFusionReactor.name: superalloyFusionReactor

battery.description: Stores energy generated by renewable sources to ensure uninterrupted power supply.  Requires low maintenance.

sourceId.name: Advanced batteries
sourceId.description: Doubles the storage capacity of batteries.

battery.name: battery

storageDepot.description: A facility for storing large quantities of essential resources like metal, water, and food.
storageDepot.name: storageDepot

hydrogenBattery.description: Stores energy in the form of hydrogen.

sourceId.name: Hydrogen Battery Array
sourceId.description: Stores energy using compressed or liquid hydrogen.

hydrogenBattery.name: hydrogenBattery

sourceId.name: Android Manufacturing
sourceId.description: Enables the manufacturing of androids, which can be both workers and colony helpers.  Androids require their own housing.  They may also be purchased using cargo rockets.

dustFactory.description: Generates large amount of black dust with an albedo of 0.05, and spreads it over the surface.  In turn, the black dust allows the ground to absorb heat better.  May need millions to have any meaningful effect.

sourceId.name: Black Dust production
sourceId.description: Unlocks a blueprint for black dust production, which can over a very long time significantly reduce the albedo of the ground to 0.05.

sourceId.name: Adapted black dust production
sourceId.description: Quadruples the efficiency of dust factories.

dustFactory.name: dustFactory

spaceMirror.description: Expands the space mirror facility.  Increases the effective luminosity.  Will cost only glass after the space elevator is built.  May need billions to have any meaningful effect.

sourceId.description: Built at a Lagrangian point, this facility will allow the construction of space mirrors from the buildings terraforming tab.

sourceId.name: Space Mirror Facility Oversight
sourceId.description: Applies automated oversight controls to the space mirror facility.

sourceId.name: Space mirrors
sourceId.description: Unlocks a special project to launch the space mirror facility, which allows the deployment of space mirrors to increase the effective solar luminosity.

sourceId.name: spaceMirrorFacility

sourceId.description: This cable eliminates all metal costs from multiple space activities.

sourceId.name: Space Elevator
sourceId.description: Enables a special project for the space elevator, which eliminates the metal cost of many space activities.

sourceId.name: spaceElevator

spaceMirror.name: spaceMirror

hyperionLantern.description: Orbital array that beams artificial sunlight onto the planet.

sourceId.name: Hyperion Lantern
sourceId.description: Research the construction of a large orbital facility that increases planetary luminosity.

hyperionLantern.name: hyperionLantern

ghgFactory.description: Produces very potent, safe greenhouse gases.

sourceId.name: Direct AI integration.
sourceId.description: Integrates yourself within all factories to reduce all factory worker requirements by 25%.

sourceId.name: Terraforming Bureau
sourceId.description: Establishes oversight to automatically halt GHG factories at a chosen temperature and oxygen factories when O₂ pressure is too high.

sourceId.name: Greenhouse Gas Factories
sourceId.description: Allows the construction of greenhouse gas factories to produce SF6 which is stable, non-toxic and 23500 times more potent than CO2.

sourceId.name: Streamlined Greenhouse Gas Production
sourceId.description: Doubles the efficiency of GHG factories.

sourceId.name: Mass Greenhouse Gas Production
sourceId.description: Doubles the efficiency of GHG factories, again.

ghgFactory.name: ghgFactory

oxygenFactory.description: Extracts oxygen from liquid water via electrolysis.

sourceId.name: Direct AI integration.
sourceId.description: Integrates yourself within all factories to reduce all factory worker requirements by 25%.

sourceId.name: Terraforming Bureau
sourceId.description: Establishes oversight to automatically halt GHG factories at a chosen temperature and oxygen factories when O₂ pressure is too high.

sourceId.name: Water Electrolysis
sourceId.description: Unlocks a factory to produce oxygen from water.  Very energy intensive.

oxygenFactory.name: oxygenFactory

biodome.description: Produces life using water, carbon dioxide and artificial light.  Produces a small amount of oxygen.  Requires an active life design that can survive somewhere to function.  Also produces life design points regardless.

sourceId.name: Direct AI integration.
sourceId.description: Integrates yourself within all factories to reduce all factory worker requirements by 25%.

sourceId.name: Life Designing and Production
sourceId.description: Allows the designing and production of specially engineered biomass.

biodome.name: biodome

t1_colony.description: A small, self-sufficient habitat that serves as a starting point for early settlers. This outpost provides basic amenities and supports a small crew of researchers.
t1_colony.name: t1_colony

t2_colony.description: As the colony expands, this larger outpost offers improved facilities and can house a growing number of colonists.

sourceId.name: Permanent outpost
sourceId.description: Enables a larger colony for more efficient colonization.

t2_colony.name: t2_colony

t3_colony.description: A well-developed outpost that represents a significant milestone in colonial growth. It provides a comfortable living environment and supports a thriving community of colonists.

sourceId.name: Large outpost
sourceId.description: Enables a very large outpost, suitable for long-term colonization.

t3_colony.name: t3_colony

t4_colony.description: A self-sufficient, fully insulated habitat designed to support a large population, providing essential amenities and sustainable infrastructure for a thriving community.

sourceId.name: Dome town
sourceId.description: The first dome design.  Can use androids as consumer goods.

t4_colony.name: t4_colony

t5_colony.description: Dome City is a large, climate-controlled habitat supporting a thriving population with advanced amenities, sustainable agriculture, and cutting-edge infrastructure—an oasis of comfort and innovation on the frontier.

sourceId.name: Dome City
sourceId.description: A larger dome design.

t5_colony.name: t5_colony

t6_colony.description: A massive arcology structure designed to be a fully autonomous city, supporting a large population with advanced research and production facilities.

sourceId.name: Metropolis
sourceId.description: Too big to be a dome, rather a collection of interlocked domes.

t6_colony.name: t6_colony

t7_colony.description: A planet-spanning city offering unparalleled comfort and capacity. Reduces land for life growth and lowers life terraforming requirements.
t7_colony.name: t7_colony
